text: The Italian Wars, often known as the Great Wars of Italy and sometimes as the Habsburgâ€“Valois Wars, were a long series of wars fought between 1494 and 1559 in Italy during the Renaissance. The conflicts involved the major powers of Italy and Europe. ==References== Category:16th century in Italy Category:Wars involving Europe Category:15th-century conflicts Category:16th-century conflicts Category:15th century in Italy
